alert.note: Alert for Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 9:44PM CDT until July 21 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Marengo County in southwestern Alabama... Southwestern Sumter County in west central Alabama... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 944 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cuba to Nanafalia to near Pine Hill, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cuba, Sweet Water, Myrtlewood, Putnam, Shawnee, Nanafalia, Magnolia, Wayne, Surginer, Miller, Kinterbish, Dixons Mill, Vineland, Half Acre, Clayhill, Nicholsville, Oakchia and Ward. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
